title: 02/09/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/09/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Mark Sanchez who reveals that he almost committed to Ohio State before finding out about the weather in the winter. 3x Cy Young award winner Clayton Kershaw tells us he's preparing as if the season is starting on time, but knows it may be unlikely. Carson Palmer joins us in-studio to preview the Super Bowl. And Al Michaels shares whether he'll be eating a menu while broadcasting the Super Bowl

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
